mixed.required: This field is a required field
mixed.oneOf: This field must be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notOneOf: This field must not be one of the following values: {{values}}

string.length: This field must be exactly {{length}} characters
string.min: This field must be at least {{min}} characters
string.max: This field must be at most {{max}} characters
string.matches: This field must match the following: "{{regex}}"
string.email: This field must be a valid email address
string.url: This field must be a valid URL
string.uuid: This field must be a valid UUID
string.trim: This field must be a trimmed string
string.lowercase: This field must be a lowercase string
string.uppercase: This field must be a upper case string

number.min: This field must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
number.max: This field must be less than or equal to {{max}}
number.lessThan: This field must be less than {{less}}
number.moreThan: This field must be greater than {{more}}
number.positive: This field must be a positive number
number.negative: This field must be a negative number
number.integer: This field must be an integer

date.min: This field must be later than {{min}}
date.max: This field must be at earlier than {{max}}

array.min: This field must have at least {{min}} items
array.max: This field must have less than or equal to {{max}} items
